you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease bobble bobble stitch front loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - dark grey and green - yarn needle - scissors - stuffing final size - width of 5 cm and height of 7 cm technical notes *most rounds are joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *make sure you stuff the cauldron before sewing the potion down *at the end of each round/row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern cauldron dark grey round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch 6 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 12 sts round 3 chain 1 make 1 bobble in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 12 sts round 4 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 18 sts round 5 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 24 sts round 6-9 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 24 sts round 10 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 18 sts round 11 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 12 sts *work in the front loop only for round 12 round 12 chain 1 make 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 24 sts *fasten_off handles dark grey make two row 1 chain 10 *fasten_off and leave a 5 cm yarn tail to sew the handles to the sides stuff the cauldron after sewing on the handles potion green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *round 3 will have 8 drips drip 1 chain 7 start in the second
